title: Meet You at the Blossom
overview: The charming and wealthy young master of the Jin family, Jin Xiaobao, though a lover of beauty, is also humorous and considerate, always yearning for a good match. On a dark and windy night, his ideal partner suddenly appears before him! The beautiful and cold-hearted Miss Huaien, however, is embroiled in a deadly crisis. How could Xiaobao pass up the chance to play the hero? But instead of winning the beauty as his bride, he ends up compromising himself! This "beauty" not only has a mysterious gender but also an entangled history with the Jin family. When Xiaobao and Huaien finally come to understand each other, will they still have the courage to continue their romance?
